Q_DESC:
Harsh has two stacks of objects. Each object is denoted by an upper case letter. He is wondering what is the lexicographically smallest sequence of objects that can be made using the two stacks. He can take an object only from the top of the stack. Also, He wants to use all the objects available.

Input
Input description.

The first line contains the number of test cases, T . Every next two lines contains two strings S1,S2 denoting the objects in the stack.
Output
Output description.


Output the lexicographically smallest string for each case.
Constraints
1  T  10
1 |S1|  105
1 |S2|  105
